chip.title: Point code configuration
chip.name: Name
chip.label_bind_close: Whether the recover number is included in the increase/decrease code
chip.title_add: Add a new point code configuration

kind.title: Betting items
kind.name: Configuration item name
kind.field_check_kill_bind: Please select a kill code binding
kind.field_check_compensation_bind: Please select a compensation code binding
kind.btn_compose_oppose: Add mutually exclusive combinations of the same level
kind.tips_level: The top level is a required option when entering, and cannot be modified after the level is determined
kind.tips_position: Selecting the main image will replace the bottom large image, and a top-level configuration item needs to be bound
kind.tips_bind: When the current [position] is [main image], a top-level configuration item needs to be bound, indicating that it can only be used under this top-level configuration item
kind.tips_calc1: Select [Normal], and the odds and other information configured in this configuration item will be used for compensation;
kind.tips_calc2: If [sub-item] is selected, the odds information of the selected sub-item in its [combination configuration] will be used for compensation. Usually, its sub-items are [mutually exclusive]. Otherwise, if multiple options are selected for the opening result, only one item will be selected
kind.tips_card_pattern: Select the card type logo, which can be used for large screen display and camera scanning
kind.tips_kill_type: Choose to kill half or not, you can determine the killing code rules of the top configuration items bound to the killing code
kind.tips_compensation_type: Choose full compensation or half compensation, you can determine the compensation code rules of the top configuration items bound to the compensation code
kind.tips_insurance: Choose insurance, you can determine the insurance rules of the top configuration items bound to the insurance
kind.tips_compose_select: Please select the top configuration item on the left first
kind.tips_compose_oppose_select: Please select at least two configuration items
kind.title_compose_oppose: Select a mutually exclusive configuration item at the same level

list.title: Game List
list.name: Game name
list.tips_add_warn: After adding a game, you need to check the [member-game configuration] ratio!
list.tips_config_sub_calc: The value of this configuration item comes from its sub-configuration items, which are set in [Betting items/Combination Configuration]
